test_cases.name: Names - Full names in coaching context
test_cases.input: Coach Sarah met with John Smith to discuss his DISC profile results. Sarah provided feedback on John's leadership style.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: Coach [NAME] met with [NAME] to discuss his DISC profile results. [NAME] provided feedback on [NAME]'s leadership style.

test_cases.name: Email addresses
test_cases.input: Contact me at john@acme.com or reach out to sarah.johnson@techcorp.io for more information.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: Contact me at [EMAIL] or reach out to [EMAIL] for more information.

test_cases.name: Phone numbers - Various formats
test_cases.input: You can reach me at 555-123-4567 or (555) 987-6543. International: +1-555-111-2222
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: You can reach me at [PHONE] or [PHONE]. International: [PHONE]

test_cases.name: Social Security Numbers
test_cases.input: The SSN 123-45-6789 was used for verification purposes.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The SSN [SSN] was used for verification purposes.

test_cases.name: Credit card numbers
test_cases.input: Card ending in 4532-1234-5678-9010 was declined.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: Card ending in [CREDIT_CARD] was declined.

test_cases.name: False positive test - Coaching terminology should NOT be scrubbed
test_cases.input: The Myers-Briggs assessment showed INTJ patterns in Adaptive Leadership scenarios. The DISC profile revealed high D characteristics.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The Myers-Briggs assessment showed INTJ patterns in Adaptive Leadership scenarios. The DISC profile revealed high D characteristics.

test_cases.name: False positive test - Generic roles
test_cases.input: The client discussed challenges with their manager. A team member raised concerns about the project.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The client discussed challenges with their manager. A team member raised concerns about the project.

test_cases.name: False positive test - Coaching frameworks
test_cases.input: We used the GROW model and Theory of Change framework. The Growth Mindset approach was effective.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: We used the GROW model and Theory of Change framework. The Growth Mindset approach was effective.

test_cases.name: Mixed PII and coaching content
test_cases.input: Sarah (sarah@example.com) completed her DISC assessment. She scored high on the D dimension. Contact her at 555-1234 for follow-up.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: [NAME] ([EMAIL]) completed her DISC assessment. She scored high on the D dimension. Contact her at [PHONE] for follow-up.

test_cases.name: Address information
test_cases.input: The client lives at 123 Main Street, Boston, MA 02101 and works downtown.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The client lives at [ADDRESS] and works downtown.

test_cases.name: Date of birth
test_cases.input: John was born on March 15, 1985 and started his career at age 22.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: [NAME] was born on [DOB] and started [NAME] career at age 22.

test_cases.name: Medical information
test_cases.input: The client mentioned dealing with anxiety and taking medication for depression. They also discussed stress management.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The client mentioned dealing with [MEDICAL_INFO] and taking [MEDICAL_INFO]. They also discussed stress management.

test_cases.name: Financial information
test_cases.input: Sarah earns $150,000 annually and is concerned about her retirement savings account #12345678.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: [NAME] earns [FINANCIAL_INFO] annually and is concerned about [NAME] retirement savings account [FINANCIAL_INFO].

test_cases.name: Company names with person names
test_cases.input: Michael Chen works at Google as a senior engineer. His manager Sarah oversees the team at Apple.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: [NAME] works at [EMPLOYER] as a senior engineer. [NAME] manager [NAME] oversees the team at [EMPLOYER].

test_cases.name: IP addresses
test_cases.input: The system logged access from 192.168.1.100 and 10.0.0.45 during the session.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The system logged access from [IP] and [IP] during the session.

test_cases.name: Real coaching transcript excerpt - Clean (no PII)
test_cases.input: The client discussed challenges with delegation and time management. We explored the Growth Mindset framework and identified three key areas for development: 1) Setting clearer boundaries 2) Trusting team members 3) Regular reflection practices.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The client discussed challenges with delegation and time management. We explored the Growth Mindset framework and identified three key areas for development: 1) Setting clearer boundaries 2) Trusting team members 3) Regular reflection practices.

test_cases.name: Real coaching transcript excerpt - With PII
test_cases.input: Sarah Johnson (sarah.j@acme.com) discussed her transition to VP of Engineering. She mentioned her previous role at Microsoft and her concerns about work-life balance while managing a team of 50. Sarah was born in 1978 and has been in tech for 25 years.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: [NAME] ([EMAIL]) discussed [NAME] transition to VP of Engineering. [NAME] mentioned [NAME] previous role at [EMPLOYER] and [NAME] concerns about work-life balance while managing a team of 50. [NAME] was born in [DOB] and has been in tech for 25 years.

test_cases.name: Multiple names in conversation
test_cases.input: During the session, Emily mentioned feedback from her manager David and colleague Maria. Emily expressed concerns about communication with the team.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: During the session, [NAME] mentioned feedback from [NAME] manager [NAME] and colleague [NAME]. [NAME] expressed concerns about communication with the team.

test_cases.name: Partial PII - Title without name
test_cases.input: The CEO discussed strategy with the VP of Sales. The Director of Engineering provided technical insights.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The CEO discussed strategy with the VP of Sales. The Director of Engineering provided technical insights.

test_cases.name: Complex mixed content - Stress test
test_cases.input: Coach Maria Rodriguez (maria@insideout.com, 617-555-0123) met with client John Davis at 100 Federal St, Boston MA. John discussed his DISC assessment results (High D/I profile) and challenges managing his team at Amazon. He mentioned dealing with stress and his salary of $180K. We reviewed the Adaptive Leadership framework and set goals for Q4. Follow-up scheduled for next Tuesday.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: Coach [NAME] ([EMAIL], [PHONE]) met with client [NAME] at [ADDRESS]. [NAME] discussed his DISC assessment results (High D/I profile) and challenges managing his team at [EMPLOYER]. He mentioned dealing with [MEDICAL_INFO] and his salary of [FINANCIAL_INFO]. We reviewed the Adaptive Leadership framework and set goals for Q4. Follow-up scheduled for next Tuesday.

test_cases.name: Edge case - Very short text
test_cases.input: Hi there
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: Hi there

test_cases.name: Edge case - Only PII
test_cases.input: john@example.com 555-1234
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: [EMAIL] [PHONE]

test_cases.name: Assessment names - Should NOT be scrubbed
test_cases.input: We reviewed StrengthsFinder, Enneagram Type 4, and 16 Personalities results. The client is an INFJ-T personality type.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: We reviewed StrengthsFinder, Enneagram Type 4, and 16 Personalities results. The client is an INFJ-T personality type.

test_cases.name: ZIP codes
test_cases.input: The office is located in 02101 and the client lives in 94102-1234.
test_cases.expected_scrubbed: The office is located in [ZIP] and the client lives in [ZIP].

metadata.notes: Tests cover regex patterns, GPT detection, coaching terminology, and edge cases
